string.name: autoLoad
string.tiptext: If true, automatically loads the content

string.name: bytesLoaded
string.tiptext: Returns the number of bytes loaded of the Loader content

string.name: bytesTotal
string.tiptext: Returns the size of the Loader content in bytes

string.name: content
string.tiptext: Returns the content of the Loader

string.name: contentPath
string.tiptext: Gets or sets the absolute or relative URL of the content to be loaded

string.name: currentFocusedForm
string.tiptext: Leaf-node form that contains the current focused field or component

string.name: currentFocusedScreen
string.tiptext: Current leaf-most screen containing the global focus

string.name: enabled
string.tiptext: Specifies whether component accepts user-interaction

string.name: indexInParent
string.tiptext: index of this screen in its parent (getChildScreen)

string.name: indexInParentForm
string.tiptext: index of this form in its parent (getChildForm)

string.name: numChildForms
string.tiptext: number of child forms of this form

string.name: numChildScreens
string.tiptext: number of child screens of this screen

string.name: numChildren
string.tiptext: Returns the number of children

string.name: parentForm
string.tiptext: Form containing this form

string.name: parentIsForm
string.tiptext: True if this forms's _parent is a form

string.name: parentIsScreen
string.tiptext: True if this screen's _parent is a screen

string.name: parentScreen
string.tiptext: Screen containing this screen

string.name: percentLoaded
string.tiptext: Gets the percentage of the content loaded

string.name: rootForm
string.tiptext: Root form of the form subtree that contains this form

string.name: rootScreen
string.tiptext: Root of the screen subtree that contains this screen

string.name: scaleContent
string.tiptext: If true, scales the content to fit the Loader's size

string.name: scaleX
string.tiptext: Specifies the horizontal scale factor

string.name: scaleY
string.tiptext: Specifies the vertical scale factor

string.name: visible
string.tiptext: controls whether the form is visible

string.name: addEventListener
string.tiptext: Adds a listener for an event

string.name: createClassObject
string.tiptext: Creates a sub-object using its class name

string.name: createObject
string.tiptext: Creates a sub-object using its symbol name

string.name: destroyObject
string.tiptext: Destroys the specified object

string.name: getChildAt
string.tiptext: Returns the child at the specified position

string.name: getChildForm
string.tiptext: Get the nth child of this form

string.name: getChildScreen
string.tiptext: Get the nth child of a screen

string.name: getFocus
string.tiptext: Returns the component that currently has focus

string.name: getStyle
string.tiptext: Gets the style value associated with the style property

string.tiptext: Handles all events

string.name: invalidate
string.tiptext: Marks an object to be redrawn on the next frame interval

string.tiptext: Tells the Loader to start loading its content

string.tiptext: Moves the object to the specified location

string.tiptext: Redraws an object immediately

string.tiptext: Sets focus to this component

string.name: setSize
string.tiptext: Resizes the object to the specified size

string.name: setStyle
string.tiptext: Sets a style value for the specified style property

string.tiptext: Use default keydown handling of arrow keys to navigate slides

string.name: autoLoad
string.tiptext: If true, automatically loads the content

string.name: bytesLoaded
string.tiptext: Returns the number of bytes loaded of the Loader content

string.name: bytesTotal
string.tiptext: Returns the size of the Loader content in bytes

string.name: content
string.tiptext: Returns the content of the Loader

string.name: contentPath
string.tiptext: Gets or sets the absolute or relative URL of the content to be loaded

string.name: currentChildSlide
string.tiptext: Immediate child slide that contains the current (leaf-node) slide

string.name: currentFocusedScreen
string.tiptext: Current leaf-most screen containing the global focus

string.name: currentFocusedSlide
string.tiptext: Leaf-node slide that contains the current focused field or component

string.name: currentSlide
string.tiptext: Leaf-node slide that is currently active

string.name: defaultKeyDownHandler
string.tiptext: keydown handler to call to process keys for this slide

string.name: enabled
string.tiptext: Specifies whether component accepts user-interaction

string.name: firstSlide
string.tiptext: First leaf slide in this slide's subtree

string.name: indexInParent
string.tiptext: index of this screen in its parent (getChildScreen)

string.name: indexInParentSlide
string.tiptext: index of this slide in its parent (getChildSlide)

string.name: lastSlide
string.tiptext: Last leaf slide in this slide's subtree

string.name: nextSlide
string.tiptext: next slide after this slide in the slide outline

string.name: numChildScreens
string.tiptext: number of child screens of this screen

string.name: numChildSlides
string.tiptext: number of child slides of this slide

string.name: numChildren
string.tiptext: Returns the number of children

string.name: overlayChildren
string.tiptext: Display child slides as bullet-style overlays

string.name: parentIsScreen
string.tiptext: True if this screen's _parent is a screen

string.name: parentIsSlide
string.tiptext: True if this slide's _parent is a slide

string.name: parentScreen
string.tiptext: Screen containing this screen

string.name: parentSlide
string.tiptext: Slide containing this slide

string.name: percentLoaded
string.tiptext: Gets the percentage of the content loaded

string.name: playHidden
string.tiptext: Continue to play the slide's timeline when the slide is not visible

string.name: previousSlide
string.tiptext: previous slide before this slide in the slide outline

string.name: rootScreen
string.tiptext: Root of the screen subtree that contains this screen

string.name: rootSlide
string.tiptext: Root slide of the slide subtree that contains this screen
